titleStmt.title: Cheirexokē [sic] the excellency or handy-vvork of the royal hand.
titleStmt.author: Allen, Thomas, d. 1684.

titleStmt.title: Cheirexokē [sic] the excellency or handy-vvork of the royal hand.
titleStmt.author: Allen, Thomas, d. 1684.
Harris, Thomas, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Godbid for the author,

notesStmt.note: Written by Dr. Thomas Allen. Cf. Halkett & Laing. Cf. also Wm. Beckett's Enquiry in the antiquity and efficacy of touching for the king's evil, 1722, p. 58: "Dr. Thomas Allen, sometime of Caius College in Cambridge, afterward physician in ordinary to King Charles the Second, published a treatise of the cure of the evil by the touch, which he entitles, 'The excellency or handy-work of the royal hand'." BM attributes to either Allen or to Thomas Harris.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
